org.cpsolver.ifs.example.jobshop

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.ifs.model.Variable<Operation,Location>
      • org.cpsolver.ifs.example.jobshop.Operation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Operation>

    public class Operation
extends Variable<Operation,Location>
    Operation.

    Each operation has its number, job, machine and processing time
    Version:
    IFS 1.3 (Iterative Forward Search)
